column2: 'Twas no use going twice when once would do, and he chose to get business forward.
column3: 'twas no use going twice when once would do, and he chose to get business forward.

column2: Get on, you lazy fellow, he said, "or I'll make you."
column3: Get on, you lazy fellow, he said, "or I'll make you."

column2: Pray, stop; I think I can help you if you will let me.
column3: Pray, stop; I think I can help you if you will let me.

column2: You won't put that rein on again, will you?" for he was just going to hitch it up on the old plan.
column3: You won't put that rein on again, will you?" for he was just going to hitch it up on the old plan.
